title: Delinea Secret Server - Overview
description: This dashboard provides information about the logs generated on Delinea Secret Server.

definition.content:
Delinea Secret Server is an enterprise-grade password management solution designed to help organizations securely store, manage, and control access to privileged credentials. It aims to improve the security of sensitive data, reduce the risk of data breaches, and streamline the password management process.

This dashboard provides information about event_type, action, user, etc logs generated on Delinea Secret Server.

For more information, see the [Delinea Secret Server Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/delinea_secret_server/).

Tips:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Delinea Secret Server logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security?query=source%3Adelinea-secret-server%20service%3Adelinea-secret-server&agg_m=count&agg_m_source=base&agg_t=count&column=time&fromUser=false&order=desc&start=1741194100663&end=1741280500663&paused=false).

definition.title: Site Configuration Change Logs over Time

search.query: source:delinea-secret-server service:delinea-secret-server @event_type:engine @action:(delete OR update OR create OR engineactivate OR enginedeactivate) $Event-Type $Action $User-Name $Folder-Name
